bibl.title: Studies on the Derveni Papyrus.
bibl.note: The volume arises from a colloquium held at Princeton University on 17-18 April 1993. - Introduction. - I. Translation. - II. General Essays. - III. Specific Columns. - Pp. 174-185: Maria Serena FUNGHI, Bibliography of the Derveni Papyrus. - Index of Passages in the Derveni Papyrus. Index of Passages in Other Ancient Authors [both compiled by John A. PALMER]. Index of Names and Subjects. Index of Greek Words.
bibl.seg: LAKS André and Glenn W. MOST (Edd.), Studies on the Derveni Papyrus.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1997, 8°, viii-204 pp. ISBN 0-19-815032-6.
